qoute: Creativity can solve almost any problem. The creative act, the defeat of habit by orginality, overcomes everything.
Creativity is a drug I cannot live without.
Creativity is a highfalutin word for the work I have to do between now and Tuesday.
Creativity involves breaking out of established patterns in order to look at things in a different way.
Creativity is a natural extension of our enthusiasm.
Creativity is allowing oneself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
Creativity is the sudden cessation of stupidity.
Creativity can solve almost any problem. The creative act, the defeat of habit by orginality, overcomes everything.
Creativity is a drug I cannot live without.
Creativity is a highfalutin word for the work I have to do between now and Tuesday.
Creativity involves breaking out of established patterns in order to look at things in a different way.
Creativity is a natural extension of our enthusiasm.
Creativity is allowing oneself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
Creativity is the sudden cessation of stupidity.
Creativity requires the courage to let go of certainties.
Frugality without creativity is deprivation.
Responsibility is what awaits outside the Eden of Creativity.
The chief enemy of creativity is good taste.
The essential part of creativity is not being afraid to fail.
The lash may force men to physical labor, it cannot force them to spiritual creativity.
The legs are the wheels of creativity.
The secret to creativity is knowing how to hide your sources.
True creativity often starts where language ends.
Whatever creativity is, it is in part a solution to a problem.
